result.markdown:
--- title: "all distrillery and bottler name" subtitle: "with whiskybase.com data" author: "Tony Duan" execute: warning: false error: false format: html: toc: true toc-location: right code-fold: show code-tools: true number-sections: true code-block-bg: true code-block-border-left: "#31BAE9" --- ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidyverse) library(rvest) library(stringr) library(openxlsx) library(readxl) library(janitor) library(writexl) library(gt) ``` ::: # all distrillery ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} url='https://www.whiskybase.com/whiskies/distilleries' ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} page=read_html(url) element=page %>% html_nodes("*") %>% html_attr("class") %>% unique() ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} text=page%>% html_nodes("*")%>% html_text2() ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} head(text) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "document.documentElement.className += 'js' Distilleries - Whiskybase - Ratings and reviews for whisky window.__exc = { e: [], a: function(e) { return window.application ? window.application.exec(e) : __exc.e.push(e) } }" [2] "" [3] "" [4] "document.documentElement.className += 'js'" [5] "" [6] "" ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} write_delim(tibble(text), "./data/all distillery name.txt") ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} link= page%>%html_nodes(".clickable a")%>% html_attr('href') ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} data=page%>% html_nodes("table")%>%html_table(fill = TRUE) %>% as.data.frame() %>% mutate(link=link) %>% select(-Var.6) ``` ::: output ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} write.xlsx(data,'./output/all distillery.xlsx') ``` ::: # summary of the data ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} data002=data %>% filter(Whiskies>10,Votes>100) %>% arrange(desc(Rating)) %>% select(-link) data003=data002 %>% rowid_to_column("No") head(data003) %>% gt() %>% as_raw_html() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
No Name Country Whiskies Votes Rating
1 Kawasaki Japan 31 362 90.11
2 Brora Scotland 292 10351 90.01
3 Glenlochy Scotland 121 1762 89.87
4 Port Ellen Scotland 1521 27323 89.27
5 Tullamore (1829 - 1954) Ireland 26 144 89.19
6 Glenugie Scotland 134 1769 89.18
``` ::: ::: # all bottler ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} url='https://www.whiskybase.com/whiskies/bottlers' ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} link= page%>%html_nodes(".clickable a")%>% html_attr('href') ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} data=page%>% html_nodes("table")%>%html_table(fill = TRUE) %>% as.data.frame() %>% mutate(link=link) %>% select(-'Var.6') ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} names(data) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "Name" "Country" "Whiskies" "Votes" "Rating" "link" ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} #glimpse(data) ``` ::: output ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} write.xlsx(data,'./output/all bottler.xlsx') ``` ::: # summary of the data ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} data002=data %>% filter(Whiskies>10,Votes>100) %>% arrange(desc(Rating)) %>% select(-link) data003=data002 %>% rowid_to_column("No") head(data003) %>% gt() %>% as_raw_html() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
No Name Country Whiskies Votes Rating
1 Kawasaki Japan 31 362 90.11
2 Brora Scotland 292 10351 90.01
3 Glenlochy Scotland 121 1762 89.87
4 Port Ellen Scotland 1521 27323 89.27
5 Tullamore (1829 - 1954) Ireland 26 144 89.19
6 Glenugie Scotland 134 1769 89.18
``` ::: :::
